channel.title: Salvatore Abello's Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Salvatore Abello's Blog

item.title: Achievements
item.description: [TeamItaly 2023 - now] I have been selected to be part of TeamItaly: the national cybersecurity team, where the most talented individuals will have the opportunity to represent the country in various international cybersec competitions. Here you can find our results. [ECSC 2023] Every year, each country chooses 10 participants to compete in the European Cyber â€‹â€‹â€‹â€‹Security Challenge (ECSC). In 2023, I was selected to compete in the ECSC which took place in Hamar, Norway.

item.title: Whoami
item.description: Hi! I’m Salvatore Abello and I’m a computer science student and a cybersec enthusiast. I’m also a CTF player in various teams like @mhackeroni, @Pwnzer0tt1, @TRX and other smaller teams. I’m intrested in Web Security, especially when it comes to finding and exploiting weird behavior in libraries or products. I also love breaking Python Sandboxes (pyjails) ðŸ˜€ Cybersecurity is not the only thing that interests me! You can find some of my projects here.

item.title: Yet Another PyJail - PySysMagic - L3ak CTF 2024
item.description: I partecipated to the first edition of L3ak CTF with FoocHackz. I solved this challenge, it wasn’t hard but writing a working exploit took me at least one/two hours. Index Index Overview Source A bit of Py-Magic Obligatory Pyjail Building payloads from docs Solve Flag Considerations Source Overview As the title of the challenge suggests, it’s a pyjail. To be more precise, two challenges from two different CTFs were merged together

item.title: One-shot CSS Injection - newdiary - 0ctf 2023
item.description: This year, for the first time, I partecipated to 0ctf with mhackeroni. Me, @Ricy and @Alemmi solved this challenge, we spent many hours in order to find a working exploit, but it was worth it. Index New Diary (14 solves) Index Overview Exploit idea Leaking the nonce Sources CSS exploit First note (ID 0) Second Note (ID 1) Third Note (ID 2) Final exploit Overview This is a whitebox web challenge and it’s client-side, we need to steal the admin cookie with the flag inside, so we have to do XSS.

item.title: My First Writeup - ez-class - B01lers CTF 2023
item.description: I liked this challenge a lot so I decided to create a writeup (my first, actually) about it. Thanks to the organizers for this wonderful CTF! Overview This challenge is about a service that gives us the possibility to create and run classes. We can specify: The class name The parent class The mumber of methods The method names The method params The method bodies There is no blacklist except for this little one here: ().
